thread.title: BRIEF-Acuity BrandsAnnounces Acquisition Of Lucid Design Group

title: BRIEF-Acuity BrandsAnnounces Acquisition Of Lucid Design Group

organizations.name: brandsannounces acquisition of lucid design group
brief-acuity brandsannounces acquisition of lucid design group reute

text:
February 12, 2018 / 4:41 PM / in 25 minutes BRIEF-Acuity BrandsAnnounces Acquisition Of Lucid Design Group Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Acuity Brands Inc: 
* ACUITY BRANDS, INC. ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF LUCID DESIGN GROUP, INC. 
* ACUITY BRANDS INC - TERMS OF ACQUISITION WERE NOT DISCLOSED. 
* ACUITY BRANDS INC - ‍ACQUISITION OF LUCID IS NOT EXPECTED TO HAVE A MATERIAL IMPACT ON FISCAL 2018 CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL PERFORMANCE OF ACUITY BRANDS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
